thread.title: Using GenAI to improve developer experience on AWS | Rust LibHunt
thread.title_full: Using GenAI to improve developer experience on AWS | Rust LibHunt

title: Using GenAI to improve developer experience on AWS | Rust LibHunt
text: Our great sponsors - [Onboard AI]- ChatGPT with full context of any GitHub repo. - [WorkOS]- The modern API for authentication & user identity. - [InfluxDB]- Power Real-Time Data Analytics at Scale - [docs.rs](/r/docs.rs) crates.io documentation generator Working in combination with CodeWhisperer in your IDE, you can send whole code sections to Amazon Q and ask for an explanation of what the selected code does. To show how this works, we open up the file.rs file cloned from this GitHub repository. This is part of an open source project to host documentation of crates for the Rust Programming Language, which is a language we are not familiar with. - The screenshot below uses the CloudFormation template from an AWS samples application in GitHub which can be found here. - [Onboard AI](https://app.getonboardai.com/) ChatGPT with full context of any GitHub repo. Onboard AI learns any GitHub repo in minutes and lets you chat with it to locate functionality, understand different parts, and generate new code. Use it for free at app.getonboardai.com. Related posts - [Nvidia hits $2T valuation as AI frenzy grips Wall Street](/posts/1361483-nvidia-hits-2t-valuation-as-ai-frenzy-grips-wall-street) - [Moros: Hobby rust operating system with SSH demo](/posts/1361463-moros-hobby-rust-operating-system-with-ssh-demo) - [Python's pip on steroids](/posts/1361452-python-s-pip-on-steroids) - [Show HN: Kiwi â€“ Extensible Real-Time Data Streaming with WASM](/posts/1361438-show-hn-kiwi-extensible-real-time-data-streaming-with-wasm) - [Unlocking secret ThinkPad functionality for emulating USB devices](/posts/1361403-unlocking-secret-thinkpad-functionality-for-emulating-usb-devices)2 projects | [news.ycombinator.com](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39470381)| 22 Feb 2024
